text: @Yamiche The GOP is in full retreat/panic mode and desperately trying to use any tactic to remain viable.  Whether demonizing those who collect unemployment, floating wild conspiracy theories against Obama, or promoting quack Covid-19 cures, Trump and his minions are flailing away .
